meta.title: Contact – Figma to HTML/CSS/JS
meta.description: Get your design converted into production-ready frontend code on React, Next.js or Gatsby + tailwindcss for web and mobile.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Hi, my name is Dima Paputsa, I'm a startup front-end engineer. I've been building client side web applications for 16 years. I have a passion about CSS, and love to craft UIs on React or Vue.js. The interfaces I developed are used by hundreds of millions people. I live in Lisbon, love the ocean, boats and stress-free quiet life in beautiful Portugal. If you are looking to transform your design into nice html/css/js with React/Next.js/Gatsby I can probably help you. Just drop me a message.
